DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study ABT-888 Combination With Conventional Whole Brain Radiation Therapy ( WBRT ) Cancer Patients With Brain Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , multicenter , dose-escalation study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics PARP inhibitor ABT-888 combination conventional whole brain radiation therapy ( WBRT ) treatment subject solid tumor metastatic brain .
